name: A Morning With Cardlin
description:
A very, VERY short CardlinAudio visual novel.

Spend a "pun-filled" morning with Cardlin.

-

Creator's Note:

This is my first and last game. I have no experience programming visual novels AT ALL, so expect a sad excuse of a visual novel. I'm also pretty mediocre at art so the sprites and CGs are also quite depressing, andddd I suck at writing so expect the writing to be bad as well. I lowkey just made this for myself-- Really, why even play this game? Click away while you still can! :>

I also only own the sprites and CGs, I don't own the BGs used as well as the music. 

...

Watch me regret this in the future.
